Description: Warm and earthy, he gives off vibes of being very rooted and conventional. His ethnic kurta along with the simple bag slung across his shoulders and bespectacled intelligent eyes give him the aura of being intellectual. His grounded nature is what makes you seek him out when in a dilemma and the comforting aura of Zero Gravity Terrestria Deo Spray accentuates his innate sensibleness. Title: Paco Rabanne Pour Homme Deodorant Spray  -  For Men(150 ml)
Description: Paco Rabanne emerged light years away from the fashion establishment of his time. He applied his talent to redefining the legacies he considered ill-adapted to the age, offering fashion as an instrument of individuality, not a mark of social class. Clothing could dress the mind or body. His approach to fragrance reflects these tenets: "I believe it is very important that fashion and fragrance be coherent with the times. My designs are for modern women, active women, and the women of the sun." Paco Rabanne Pour Homme is a fresh fragrance, combining sweet herbs, rich aromatics and warm notes of citrus.

Description: Combo of 3 Adidas DEodorant: Pure Lightness:Pure Lightness by Adidas is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Pure Lightness was launched in 2008. It is ideal for everyday use and characterized as spontaneous and joyful. Top notes incorporate an explosion of juicy raspberry combined with fresh notes of lemon spiced with pink pepper. Notes of the heart accentuate rose flowers and glamorous violet surrounded with luminous litchi zest. The base encompasses creamy sandalwood and delicate musk.Fun Sensations arrives in a flacon shaped like previous editions from the Emotions in Motion collection. The bottle is made of glass; it is tall and narrow, perfect for holding in your hand. The name on the bottle is inspired by the bright colors of the body of the bottle, which makes it very prominent. The whole concept is complemented with a coral color which poses a contrast to the various colors of the letters on the outer carton.

Sugar scrub prevents acne, whiteheads, blackheads, breakouts and other skin blemishes. Excess oil, dirt and dead skin cells clog the pores. Skin exfoliation using sugar scrub removes dead skin cells, dirt and excess oil without drying the skin. Sugar scrub can help reverse early signs of aging. Exposure from pollution, dirt, stress and sun’s ultra violet rays damage the skin cells. This leads to skin dullness and develops early signs of aging like fine lines and uneven skin tone. Essential oils repair and tone the skin. Title: Jocose Facial Kit Gold & 24 Carat Gold Face Wash(Set of 3)
Description: 24 CARAT GOLD FACIAL KIT A Royal Facial Treatment For a Visibly Radiant Skin1. GOLD FACIAL CLEANSEREnergised with detoxifying power 24 carat Gold, Saffron and Aloe Vera. JOCOSE Gold Facial Cleanser gently but deeply cleanse the skin of all the dirt, grime, toxins and infections & promotes healthy and beautiful complexion leaving behind a clean, fresh, soft, smooth and well hydrated skin.Key Ingredients: Pure Gold, Saffron Extract, Aloe Vera Extract. 2. GOLD EXFOLIATING FACIAL SCRUBRich in strong yet gentle, herbal exfoliating & peeling agents such as Tamarind, Apricot and Walnut, JOCOSE Gold Exfoliating Scrub is a wonderful exfoliating agent that through its physical and biochemical peeling actions gently removes the hard dead cells, dirt, grime and toxins, making skin extra smooth, soft and even toned with a visible glow.Key Ingredients: Pure Gold, Apricot Fruit Extract, Tamarind Fruit Extract & Walnut Shell Grain. 3. GOLD MASSAGE CREAMJOCOSE - Gold Facial Massage Cream is a rich moisturising cream fortified with pure gold, Shea Butter & Jojoba Oil that deeply penetrates your skin thus providing the skin with vital lipids & nutrients to nourish and rejuvenate the skin at the cellular level, leaving behind a soft, supple and smooth skin with natural luminosity & spark.Key Ingredients: Pure Gold, Shea Butter and Jojoba Oil. 4. GOLD FACE PACKJOCOSE Gold Face Pack is a cream based face pack enriched with Pure Gold, Saffron and Aloe Vera that promotes skin hydration and skin toning, making skin well hydrated, firm, smooth and radiant. Jocose 24 Carat Gold Face WashFACE WASH 24 CARATE GOLD Enriched with purifying- Golden Seal, Skin Toning-Golden Pineapple & Radiance promoting - Real Gold, Jocose -24 Carat – Extra Mild-ultra-foaming soap - free Face Wash gently purifies the skin of all impurities, removes excess of sebum and infections resulting in a glowing, perfectly matte, clear and fresher skin. Directions: Take out a small quantity of face wash from tube on wet palms. Rub palms against each other to work up the lather and gently massage on face for 1- 2 minutes. Rinse with water & pat dry.

Title: Skin Absolute Eye Makeup Kit(Set of 4)
